prompts: Create a sleek electric-type Pokemon with striking yellow eyes and a dark fur coat.
Imagine a fierce Pokemon that blends both agility and power, designed for battles in urban settings.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a lion, with dynamic features and electric capabilities.
Design an intimidating yet elegant Pokemon that exudes energy and confidence, perfect for trainers.
Generate a Pokemon characterized by its bold black and blue color scheme, with a powerful presence.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in forests and grasslands, showcasing its electric prowess and stealth.
Give me a Pokemon that has a majestic tail and a fierce expression, ideal for competitive trainers.
